lines.text: When British International Pictures offered a bouquet of red poppies to the British Legion if only I would stand up to the camera and shot at once or twice, I thought to myself "Why not?" My second thought was "Why me?" And so I said "There are Admirals of the Fleet, and there are Air Marshals of the air, and there are world famous Field Marshals. Why me?" And they replied "Because this film does not treat of famous men, it treats of forgotten men."
